title: Learning Course Based on a Design Decision Framework for Strengthening Situational Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Implementing a situational learning environment focused on real-life problem-solving, optimized for smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve math problems arising in real-life contexts using a situational learning framework.
In limited technological environments, learners can simulate the mathematical modeling process using digital tools.
Through collaborative design thinking with peer learners, learners can develop multidimensional approaches to complex math problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
